step.desc: Uncap Femometer and put it under your tongue. Three beeps means BBT is taken successfully.

step.desc: BBT automatically syncs. Menstrual cycle data is easy to read on your phone.

questions.question: What is Femometer?
questions.answer: Femometer is a smart fertility tracker that is empowering women around the world by equipping them with data. The Femometer includes an intelligent tracking algorithm that learns to detect even the smallest fluctuations in your fertility cycle. With Femometer, women everywhere are empowered to understand their own bodies through data.

questions.question: How do I use Femometer?
questions.answer: Using Femometer is as simple as taking your temperature in the morning. To get an accurate reading, take your temperature orally when you first wake up in the morning, before you even sit up in bed. After using Femometer, your unique temperature data is sent directly to your smartphone which will produce comprehensive and easy-to-understand charts about your health. Femometer can be set to notify you of your period, fertility window, PMS, and when it’s time to see a doctor. Join us, we’re starting a revolution of knowledgeable, empowered women just like you.

questions.question: How does Femometer work?
questions.answer: Femometer’s advanced technology is hyper sensitive to capturing the slightest fluctuation in body temperature to within one hundredth of a degree. Femometer uses the information about your Basal Body Temperature to calculate your 6-day fertility window for pregnancy and also notify you of your period, fertility window, PMS, and when it’s time to see a doctor. With Femometer, you can own your reproductive health with smart data.

questions.question: Is Femometer accurate?
questions.answer: Femometer uses cutting-edge technology to measure your Basal Body Temperature. Basal body temperature is your lowest, and most accurate, body temperature of the day. Femometer is sensitive enough to measure tiny changes in your body temperature and translate them into interpretable data.

questions.question: What is the Basal Body Temperature?
questions.answer: Basal Body Temperature (BBT), also known as the waken body temperature, is your lowest body temperature of the day. By charting your BBT for a few months, you’ll be able to see whether there’s a pattern to your cycle, which helps predict ovulation as well as the best days to have sex. BBT charts can also help your doctor pinpoint the cause of any infertility issues.

questions.question: How can Femometer improve my fertility tracking experience?
questions.answer:
Femometer improves your fertility tracking experience in three different ways:
Obtaining your data is as easy as taking your temperature in the morning.
Femometer communicates with your smartphone to automatically keep track of your data and notifies you to important natural changes in your body.
Our intelligent tracking algorithms learn to detect even the smallest fluctuations in your fertility cycle, sending you alerts.

questions.question: What’s in the box?
questions.answer: One Femometer<nr/>One Lithium CR1632 battery<nr/>Quick start guide<nr/>

questions.question: Who is the team behind Femometer?
questions.answer: Our team consists of a group of energetic and forward-thinking entrepreneurs and specialists based in Hangzhou, China. We envision a world where women are able to take control of their body’s data in order to make smarter decisions. You can read more about us on our About Us page.

questions.question: What is the uniqueness of Femometer’s technology?
questions.answer: Femometer uses cutting-edge technology to measure your Basal Body Temperature and is sensitive enough to measure tiny changes in your body temperature and translate them into interpretable data. You just take your temperature in the morning and Femometer will automatically sync to the app and track your your data for you.

questions.question: What features are available with Femometer?
questions.answer: Femometer measures your Basal Body Temperature (BBT) and automatically syncs to your phone, tracks and predicts your cycle, and alerts you to important natural changes in your body.

questions.question: What material is Femometer made out of?
questions.answer: Femometer is made of medical-grade antibacterial and nanophase materials from Japan. This allows us to make Femometer extremely durable, sterile, and lightweight.

questions.question: Does Femometer support Bluetooth connectivity?
questions.answer: Yes. Femometer uses low energy bluetooth to automatically connect with your phone to sync data.

questions.question: Is Femometer wifi-connected?
questions.answer: No.

questions.question: What happens if my Bluebooth is not working?
questions.answer: Your data will be stored locally on the device and sent to your phone as soon as your Bluetooth connection starts working again.

questions.question: Is Femometer safe?
questions.answer: Yes. Femometer is made of medical-grade antibacterial materials.

questions.question: How accurate is the data collection?
questions.answer: The data collection is accurate enough to measure even the tiniest changes in your body temperature and translate them into interpretable data.

questions.question: Can I share my data?
questions.answer: Yes, you can share a secure link to view your chart with someone you choose.

questions.question: How is Femometer powered?
questions.answer: Femometer is powered via a Lithium CR1632 battery, which is similar to those you can find in your watch. You’ll be notified when the battery in your Femometer is running low so that you can change your battery

questions.question: What phones and devices will work with Femometer?
questions.answer: Femometer currently works with both Android and iOS smart devices to provide a comprehensive and holistic view of your body so that all women are empowered to understand their own bodies through data.

questions.question: Is Femometer safe?
questions.answer: Good health is at the core of our company and our product. Femometer is made of medical-grade antibacterial materials from Japan and has been safely tested by over 300 women to check their Basal Body Temperature.

questions.question: Is Femometer safe for women of any age?
questions.answer: Yes.

questions.question: Will my data be secure?
questions.answer: Yes. All Femometer data is securely store on a private and encrypted network.

questions.question: Where does Femometer ship to?
questions.answer: We want to equip women all around the world with a Femometer so that they can collect data and understand their bodies. With that in mind, we work with major courier companies so that we are able to ship worldwide. Shipping costs are already included for shipment to the US. We will include $6 for shipping to the rest of the world.

questions.question: Is the cost of shipping included?
questions.answer: Shipping is included to the US. For all other orders, please add $6 to your order for shipping.

questions.question: How long does it take to ship?
questions.answer: It usually takes 2-3 weeks until you can get it.

questions.question: If I have other questions, who should I contact?
questions.answer: We are receiving a lot of inquiries, and are responding as fast as possible. Please contact support@femometer.com with any other questions you may have. We’re excited to hear from you and bring on the revolution to empower women to understand their own bodies through data.

privacy.title: FEMOMETER PRIVACY POLICY
lists: This Privacy Policy (the “Policy”) provides you with information about how we may collect, use, and share your personal information so that you may make knowledgeable choices about the information that you choose to provide to us. “Personal Information” includes information that alone or when in combination with other information may be used to readily identify, contact, or locate you.
Please note that we may update this Privacy Policy from time to time, so please check back with us periodically.
This Privacy Policy provides information regarding Femometer’s data practices, including:
2. How Femometer uses “cookies” and related information collected automatically when you use our App or Website.
4. What personal information, if any, Femometer may share about you
5. Security measures that Femometer employs to protect your information from accidental loss or disclosure
6. Other things you should know about privacy and Femometer

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.desc: 棒糖网络科技为您提供新型的家庭医疗服务；您只有完全同意下列所有服务条款并完成注册程序,才能成为棒糖网络科技的用户并使用相应服务。您在使用棒糖网络科技提供的各项服务之前,应仔细阅读本用户协议。 您在注册程序过程中点击“确定”按钮即表示您与棒糖网络科技达成协议,完全接受本服务条款项下的全部条款。您一旦使用棒糖网络科技的服务,即视为您已了解并完全同意本服务条款各项内容,包括棒糖网络科技对服务条款随时做的任何修改。

lists.title: 一．服务内容
desc: 棒糖网络科技的具体服务内容由棒糖网络科技根据实际情况提供,例如个人信息、个人分享信息以及评论,在线交流等。棒糖网络科技保留变更、中断或终止部分网络服务的权利。 棒糖网络科技保留根据实际情况随时调整棒糖网络科技平台提供的服务种类、形式。棒糖网络科技不承担因业务调整给用户造成的损失。

lists.title: 二．注册义务
desc: 为了能使用本服务,您同意以下事项：依本服务注册提示请您填写正确的注册邮箱、密码和名号,并确保今后更新的登陆邮箱、名号、头像等资料的有效性和合法性。若您提供任何违法、不道德或棒糖网络科技认为不适合在棒糖网络科技上展示的资料；或者棒糖网络科技有理由怀疑你的资料属于程序或恶意操作,棒糖网络科技有权暂停或终止您的帐号,并拒绝您于现在和未来使用本服务之全部或任何部分。
棒糖网络科技无须对任何用户的任何登记资料承担任何责任,包括但不限于鉴别、核实任何登记资料的真实性、正确性、完整性、适用性及/或是否为最新资料的责任。

lists.title: 三．内容使用权
desc: 用户在棒糖网络科技发表的内容（包含但不限于棒糖网络科技目前各产品功能里的内容）仅表明其个人的立场和观点,并不代表棒糖网络科技的立场或观点。作为内容的发表者,需自行对所发表内容负责,因所发表内容引发的一切纠纷,由该内容的发表者承担全部法律及连带责任。棒糖网络科技不承担任何法律及连带责任。 用户在棒糖网络科技发布侵犯他人知识产权或其他合法权益的内容,棒糖网络科技有权予以删除,棒糖网络科技不承担任何法律及连带责任,并保留移交司法机关处理的权利。
用户不得使用棒糖网络科技服务发送或传播敏感信息和违反国家法律制度的信息,包括但不限于下列信息：
1. 反对宪法所确定的基本原则的；
2.危害国家安全,泄露国家秘密,颠覆国家政权,破坏国家统一的；
3. 损害国家荣誉和利益的；
4. 煽动民族仇恨、民族歧视,破坏民族团结的；
5. 破坏国家宗教政策,宣扬邪教和封建迷信的；
6. 散布谣言,扰乱社会秩序,破坏社会稳定的；
7. 散布淫秽、色情、赌博、暴力、凶杀、恐怖或者教唆犯罪的；
8.侮辱或者诽谤他人,侵害他人合法权益的；
9.含有法律、行政法规禁止的其他内容的。 用户承诺发表言论要：爱国、守法、自律、真实、文明。不传输任何非法的、骚扰性的、中伤他人的、辱骂性的、恐吓性的、伤害性的、庸俗的,淫秽的、危害国家安全的、泄露国家机密的、破坏国家宗教政策和民族团结的以及其它违反法律法规及政策的内容。
若用户的行为不符合以上提到的服务条款, 棒糖网络科技将作出独立判断立即取消用户服务帐号。用户需对自己在网上的行为承担法律责任,棒糖网络科技不承担任何法律及连带责任。

lists.title: 四．免责声明
desc: 一旦您注册成为用户即表示您与棒糖网络科技达成协议,完全接受本服务条款项下的全部条款。对免责声明的解释、修改及更新权均属于棒糖网络科技所有。
1. 由于您将用户密码告知他人或与他人共享注册帐户,由此导致的任何个人信息的泄漏,或其他非因棒糖网络科技原因导致的个人信息的泄漏,棒糖网络科技不承担任何法律责任；
2. 任何第三方根据棒糖网络科技各服务条款及声明中所列明的情况使用您的个人信息,由此所产生的纠纷,棒糖网络科技不承认任何法律责任；
3. 任何由于黑客攻击、电脑病毒侵入或政府管制而造成的暂时性网站关闭,棒糖网络科技不承担任何法律责任；
4. 我们鼓励用户充分利用棒糖网络科技平台自由地张贴和共享自己的信息。您可以自由张贴图片等内容,但这些内容必须位于公共领域内,或者您拥有这些内容的使用权。同时,用户不应在自己的个人主页或社区中张贴其他受版权保护的内容。
5. 用户在棒糖网络科技发布侵犯他人知识产权或其他合法权益的内容,棒糖网络科技有权予以删除,并保留移交司法机关处理的权利。
6. 用户对于其创作并在棒糖网络科技上发布的合法内容依法享有著作权及其相关权利。
7. 互联网是一个开放平台,用户将图片等资料上传到互联网上,有可能会被其他组织或个人复制、转载、擅改或做其它非法用途,用户必须充分意识此类风险的存在。用户明确同意其使用棒糖网络科技服务所存在的风险将完全由其自己承担；因其使用棒糖网络科技服务而产生的一切后果也由其自己承担,棒糖网络科技对用户不承担任何责任。

lists.title: 五．服务变更、中断或终止
desc: 如因系统维护或升级的需要而需暂停网络服务、服务功能的调整,棒糖网络科技将尽可能事先在网站上进行通告。
如发生下列任何一种情形,棒糖网络科技有权单方面中断或终止向用户提供服务而无需通知用户：
1.用户提供的个人资料不真实；
2.用户违反本服务条款中规定的使用规则；
3.未经棒糖网络科技同意,将棒糖网络科技平台用于商业目的。

lists.title: 六．服务条款的完善和修改
desc: 棒糖网络科技会有权根据互联网的发展和中华人民共和国有关法律、法规的变化,不时地完善和修改棒糖网络科技服务条款。棒糖网络科技保留随时修改服务条款的权利,用户在使用棒糖网络科技平台服务时,有必要对最新的棒糖网络科技服务条款进行仔细阅读和重新确认,当发生有关争议时,请以最新的服务条款为准

lists.title: 七．特别约定
desc: 用户使用本服务的行为若有任何违反国家法律法规或侵犯任何第三方的合法权益的情形时,棒糖网络科技有权直接删除该等违反规定之信息,并可以暂停或终止向该用户提供服务。 若用户利用本服务从事任何违法或侵权行为,由用户自行承担全部责任,棒糖网络科技不承担任何法律及连带责任。因此给棒糖网络科技或任何第三方造成任何损失,用户应负责全额赔偿。

ReturnPolicy.title: Return/exchange policy
ReturnPolicy.tips11: Condition: If you haven’t received you order or have reached to an agreement with the seller, please select “Refund only”

ReturnPolicy.tips21: Condition: Due to product problem or have reached to an agreement with the seller, please select “return and refund” and keep the tracking information.
ReturnPolicy.tips22: Return process: Request a return — Address notified to buyer — Ship the product back and add tracking information — Product received by seller, return completed.
ReturnPolicy.tips31: Condition: Due to product damage and seller agrees to reship, please select “Reship”.
ReturnPolicy.tips32: Re-ship process: Request a reship — Seller agrees to reship — Buyer received product, reship completed.
